text: They stumble upon Luder walking fast down the Seine's malecones. Where are you going? To the square of concord. At noon, Louis XVI's head is cut off. But that was two centuries ago! "Oh, my God", Luder says looking at his watch. I see you were a little late. Finished by Luder, 1989
title: Dichos de Luder 24
author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
